items.name: Galaxy z Flip
items.description: Featuring a compact design that unfolds into a full-sized touchscreen display. It combines cutting-edge technology with a unique flip form factor, offering users a blend of style and innovation.

items.name: Moto g14
items.description: Balanced mix of performance and affordability. With its capable hardware and clean Android experience, it offers a solid option for users seeking a reliable smartphone without breaking the bank.

items.name: Redmi Note 12
items.description: Offers a mix of essential features, decent performance, and a large display, catering to users looking for value-driven options.

items.name: Recliner
items.description: Experience ultimate comfort with our luxurious recliners. designed for relaxation, our recliners feature plush cushioning, adjustable positions, and stylish aesthetics, making them a perfect addition to any living space.

items.name: Book shelf
items.description: Organize your books in style with our versatile book shelves. Crafted with high-quality materials, our shelves offer ample storage while enhancing the visual appeal of your room. Choose from a range of designs to complement your decor.

items.name: Dining Table
items.description: Elevate your dining area with our elegant dining tables. Built to host memorable gatherings, our tables blend functionality with sophistication. Discover a variety of sizes and finishes that suit your taste and accommodate your loved ones comfortably

items.name: Sony 4K TV
items.description: Immerse yourself in stunning visuals with our Sony 4K TVs. Experience lifelike picture quality, vibrant colors, and smart features that redefine entertainment. Elevate your viewing experience to new heights with cutting-edge technology and sleek designs

items.name: Haier AC
items.description: Stay cool and comfortable with Haier ACs. Our energy-efficient air conditioners offer powerful cooling performance while keeping your electricity bills in check. Experience whisper-quiet operation and customizable settings for the ideal indoor climate.

items.name: LG Refrigerator
items.description: With smart storage solutions and modern aesthetics, LG refrigerators transform your kitchen into a functional and stylish space.

items.name: Muscleblaze Protein
items.description: Elevate your fitness journey with MuscleBlaze Protein. Packed with essential nutrients, our protein supplements aid muscle recovery and growth. Fuel your workouts with premium quality protein that's designed to help you achieve your fitness goals.

items.name: Ashwagandha
items.description: Discover the power of Ashwagandha, a revered herb known for its adaptogenic properties. Our Ashwagandha supplements offer natural stress relief and promote overall well-being. Experience the ancient wisdom of Ayurveda in a convenient and potent form.

items.name: Spirulina
items.description: Nourish your body with Spirulina, a nutrient-rich superfood. Packed with vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants, our Spirulina supplements support energy, immunity, and vitality. Incorporate this natural powerhouse into your daily routine for a healthier lifestyle.

items.name: Printed T-Shirt
items.description: Express your style with our printed t-shirts. From quirky designs to artistic patterns, our t-shirts let you stand out. Crafted from comfortable fabrics, they add a touch of personality to your casual wardrobe.

items.name: Blazer
items.description: Elevate your look with our sophisticated blazers. Whether for formal occasions or a sharp ensemble, our blazers offer impeccable tailoring and versatile styling. Redefine elegance and make a lasting impression.

items.name: Track Pants
items.description: Combine comfort and style with our track pants. Perfect for workouts or lounging, our track pants provide a relaxed fit and modern designs. Experience ease of movement without compromising on fashion.
